item.description:
Launch 11:00 a.m. from Pierce Island boat ramp in Portsmouth. (this is a change from the original launch site due potential access/parking problems)

Launch time is the middle of the ebb tide cycle. Follow the tide out of Little Harbor, then follow the coastline to Wallis Sands Beach. Stop for lunch at the beach and then head back. We should have slack tide and the beginning of the flood tide cycle on the return.

Return by 4:00 p.m. to Ordione.

Trip Length: 9-10 nm.

Expected water temperature: 45-50 (f)

Participants should be at launch by 10:30, ready to go at 11:00. Appropriate dress and safety equipment for winter paddling. (a drysuit or full 3mm or greater wetsuit)
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the ones with kayaks!
item.name: Ocean Paddle - Ordione to Wallis Sands Beach
